translation: Know that these two are the womb of all beings; thus, I am the source and dissolution of the whole universe.
commentary: 7.6 Etadyonini those of which these two (Prakritis) are the womb? Bhootani beings? All of them all? It is thus? Suppose know? I'm I? of the whole of the whole? Jagatah of the world? Source: source? Doomsday dissolution? and also.Commentary These two Natures? the inferior and the superior? are the womb of all beings. As I am the source of these two Prakritis or Natures also? I am the cause of this universe. The whole
